msItem.author: Bartolo of Sassoferrato
msItem.title: Tractatus de Guelfis et Gibellinis
msItem.finalRubric: Explicit tractatus de Guelfis et Gebellinis compilatus per excellentissimum legum doctorem dominum Bartolum de Saxoferrato

msItem.author: Bartolo of Sassoferrato
msItem.title: Tractatus de regimine civitatis
msItem.incipit: Quia hec ultima pars Tiberis est
msItem.finalRubric: Explicit tractatus de regimine civitatis compilatus per famosissimum legum doctorem Bartholum de Saxaferato

msItem.author: Bartolo of Sassoferrato
msItem.title: Tractatus de tyrannide
msItem.finalRubric: Explicit tractatus de tyrannide seu de tyranno compositus et compilatus per famosissimum legum doctorem Bartolum de Saxaferrato de Parusio; Deo gratias

msItem.author: Bartolo of Sassoferrato
msItem.title: Quaestio an securitate data a statuto, quod quis citatus veniens ad se excusandum non possit capi, an bannitus capi posset

msItem.author: Bartolo of Sassoferrato
Baldo degli Ubaldi
msItem.title: Tractatus de duobus fratribus
msItem.incipit: Hic tractatus de fratribus simul habitantibus in duas dividitur partes
msItem.finalRubric: Explicit tractatus de duobus fratribus editus per dominum Bartolum; etc

msItem.author: Bartolo of Sassoferrato
msItem.title: Consilium de quaestione, An filii diversorum fratrum succedant in stirpes vel in capita non obstantibus

msItem.author: Bartolo of Sassoferrato
msItem.title: Consilium de quaestione, An extrahens cartam de libro et propter hoc condempnatus, eo absente, inquisitione praecedente infamis sit

msItem.author: Bartolo of Sassoferrato
msItem.title: Consilium de quaestione, An si judex statuit terminum ad audiendum sententiam tali die ante nonam et postea reperitur sententia lata ante nonam valeat necne

msItem.author: Bartolo of Sassoferrato
msItem.title: Consilium, An ex instrumento convitacionis in quo unus dividentium scitetur se recepisse nomine dotis an probetur dos et an ex hoc solo possit agi dotem
msItem.finalRubric: ita consuluit d. Bartolus, cui concilio conscripsit dominus Franciscus Fabriano

msItem.author: Bartolo of Sassoferrato
msItem.title: Consilium de modo institutionis et substitutionis

msItem.author: Bartolo of Sassoferrato
msItem.title: Consilium, An juri agendum ad supplementum prescribatur quinquennio sicut querelae

msItem.author: Bartolo of Sassoferrato
Franciscus Tigrinus
msItem.title: Consilium, An valeat legatum factum monacho, ea conditione ut nihil communicetur monasterio

msItem.author: Bartolo of Sassoferrato
msItem.title: De insigniis et armis tractatus

msItem.author: Bartolo of Sassoferrato
msItem.title: Tractatus de repraesaliis
msItem.explicit: tradidi anno Dominice Incarnationis m.ccc.liiij. die penultima mensis Februarii
msItem.incipit: Ad primum An represalie sint licite in foro conscientie
msItem.finalRubric: Explicit tractatus represaliarum editus a domino Bartolo de Saxoferrato, legum doctore famosissimo, anno Dominice Incarnationis millesimo tricentessimo quinquagesimo quarto indictione septima, die penultima mensis Februarii Deo gracias; Amen

msItem.author: Francesco Zabarella
msItem.title: De schismate
msItem.incipit: Licet famosum et de altissima materia
msItem.finalRubric: Explicit tractatus de scismate editus et compilatus a reverendissimo in Christo patre et domino domino Francisco de Zabrellis, sacrosancte Romane ecclesie divina miseratione cardinali Florentino antistite ac utriusque juris doctore famosissimo, anno Dominice Incarnacionis millesimo quadringentesimo octavo, quarto die Novembris

msItem.author: Bonincontrus Johannis Andreae
msItem.title: De accusationibus et inquisitionibus
msItem.finalRubric: Explicit tractatus de accusacionibus, inquisicionibus et denunciationibus editus per famosum decretorum doctorem dominum Bonicontrum, venerabilis domini Johannis Andree decretorum interpretis famosissimi filium

msItem.author: Jacopo Bottrigari (?)
msItem.title: De excussionibus
msItem.finalRubric: Explicit tractatus de excussionibus traditus per Jacobum Butrida de Bononia; Deo gratias; Amen

msItem.author: Dinus de Mugello
msItem.title: De praescriptionibus

msItem.author: Bartolo of Sassoferrato
msItem.title: Consilium, An debet fieri remissio pedagii gabellae vel molendini empti propter sterilitatem vel abundantiam aquarum insolitam
msItem.finalRubric: De hac questione predicta tangit idem Bar. in 1. Interdum s. qui ex naufragio ff. de acqui. poss. et in l. Publ.

msItem.author: Bartolo of Sassoferrato
msItem.title: Consilium, An clericus teneatur solvere collectas de possessione allibrata, quae ad eum pervenit, sicut sui auctores faciebant, et an datum per commune possit imponi
msItem.finalRubric: Disputata fuit producta questio per dominum Bartolum de Saxoferrato legum doctorem famosissimum in felici studio Parusino cu. actu legentem Codicem anno Dominice incarnacionis millesimo trecentesimo quadragesimo quarto, die xviij. mensis Decembri

msItem.author: Bartolo of Sassoferrato
msItem.title: Consilium, An incarceratus indebite recommendatus debere debeat relaxari
msItem.incipit: Lapus fuit captus et in carceribus

msItem.author: Bartolo of Sassoferrato
msItem.title: Consilium, An, ex sola possessione et fructuum collectione facta uxore potiente, inducatur constitutio dotis
msItem.incipit: Quedam mulier habens magnum patrimonium misit viro

msItem.author: Bartolo of Sassoferrato (?)
msItem.title: Consilium, An filia dotata post fratris mortem possit testamentum nullum dicere

msItem.author: Franciscus Tigrinus
msItem.title: Consilium, An filius infans mortuus per viii. dies ante matrem transmittat hereditatem

msItem.author: Bartolo of Sassoferrato
msItem.title: Consilium
msItem.rubric: An Potestas possit inquirere de falsa testificacione in casu, quod vigore statuti illi testes non possunt reprobari, et quid, si transacto tempore statuti, inquirat
msItem.incipit: A domino Cino de Bononia Potestate civitatis Parusii

msItem.author: Bartolo of Sassoferrato
msItem.title: Repetitio c. Si quis presbiterorum, de rebus ecclesiae non alienandis
Consilia
msItem.note: By various jurists. The following are named: Baldus de Perusio, Paulus de Castro, Johannes de Ymola, Prodocimus de Comitibus, Jacobus de Arena, Martinus Sillanianus (?), Guido de Suzaria, Albertus Papiensis, Joh. de Blanesco, Lambertinus de Ramponibus, Franciscus de Arezio, Honofrius Bartolini de Perusio, Florianus Bononiensis, Marcus Angeli de Perusio, Bartolus a Saxoferrato, Dionysius de Perusio, Jacobus de Bindolfis de Perusio, Rainerius de Forlivio, Nicolaus de Neapoli, Crispolitus Perusinus, Matthaeus Felicianus, Bonifacius de Mantua, Franciscus de Amelia, Dinus [Mugellanus ?], Bevincasa de Arezio, Fulcus de Pacibus, Jacobus et Bartholomaeus Saliceto, Gabriel de Ascedoc[?], Philippus de Corsinis, Nellus et Alexander doctores, Lodovicus de Albergottis, Ricardus de Saliceto, Jacobus de Belviso, Oldradus de Ponte a laude Pompeia, Rugerius de Antingella, Jacobus de Clampo, Manfredus de Spoleto, Matthaeus de Pergula, Franciscus Tigrini de Pisis
msItem.incipit: Utrum testes examinati super articulis clericatus

msItem.author: Benedetto Barzi
msItem.title: Repetitio in legem, Cum quis ignorans, in duas partes distincta
msItem.incipit: In nomine et Individue Trinitatis, etc. În repeticione hujus legis, que habet subtilissimam materiam et profundum
msItem.explicit: Ex hiis contentis finem facio, presenti actui ceteris, que sunt in glossa, consentiens

msItem.title: Anonymi cujusdam Repetitio in legem, Si certis annis
msItem.explicit: si paciencia adhibeatur servitatem sibi debitam precedenti; et hiis dicta, etc

msItem.author: Raffaele Raimondi
msItem.title: Repetitio in legem, Si filius qui in potestate
msItem.incipit: Ista lex situata sub titulo de liberis et postumis in volumine Digestorum

msItem.title: Repetitio in legem, Si Pater
msItem.incipit: In summa hoc intendit testium, quo filius

msItem.title: Repetitio in legem, Qui se patris
msItem.incipit: Lex ista re et fama est difficilis valde

msItem.title: Repetitio in legem, Ex causa
Repetitio in legem, Si fratris
msItem.incipit: Hec lex est valde notabilis licet glosator in ejus commento

msItem.title: Repetitio in legem, Post dotem
msItem.incipit: Hec lex perquam difficilis secundum Bartolum dividitur in duas partes

msItem.author: Benedetto Barzi
msItem.title: Repetitio in legem, Filius a patre. Sequuntur conclusiones legis praecedentis
msItem.incipit: Lex ista in suo principio breviter
msItem.finalRubric: Repetita per dominum Benedictum de Plumbino, egregium legum doctorem famaque preclarum, in studio Placentino, tempore ducis Mediolani nomine Johannis Galiani [Galeotti?] 28 Aprilis 1401

msItem.author: Benedetto Barzi
msItem.title: Repetitio in legem, Si pater
msItem.incipit: Ista lex prima facie videtur clara
msItem.finalRubric: Repetita fuit ista lex per dominum Benedictum de Plumbino, egregium legum doctorem, in studio Placentino... Julii 1401

msItem.author: Benedetto Barzi
msItem.title: Repetitio in legem, Cum quis ignorans
msItem.finalRubric: Repetita fuit hec lex per egregium necnon famosissimum legum doctorem dominum Benedictum de Plumbino in civitate Senarum, sed secundum cursum Pisane civitatis M. cccc. tempore quo in dicta civitate vigebat studium
msItem.note: Cf. art. 28 above. Part 1 only here.

msItem.author: Benedetto Barzi (?)
msItem.title: Repetitio in legem Falsus
msItem.incipit: Lex ista, licet sit clara, habet tamen materiam

supportDesc.support: paper (watermark, fols. 60c ff., dreiberg, height 26 mm., chainline distance 65 mm.)
supportDesc.extent:
'251' leaves (but in fact more, since the modern foliation does not include blank leaves)
405 290
supportDesc.foliation: 18th-century ink foliation beginning at '6', replaced by incomplete 19th-century foliation in pencil, skipping nine blank leaves (now foliated 60c-i, k-l)

layoutDesc.layout: Ruled in leadpoint: partly frame-ruled, partly fully ruled. Layout somewhat variable, typically 2 cols. of c. 49-63 lines, ruled space 270-295 170-180

decoDesc.decoNote: Coloured initials (blue and red), 2- to 4-lines high.

binding.p: Plain parchment over pasteboard (a standard Canonici style).

history.provenance: Jacopo Soranzo (J. B. Mitchell, card catalogue of Canonici provenances)

recordHist.source: Description adapted by Matthew Holford (June 2025) from the Quarto Catalogue (H. O. Coxe, Catalogi codicum manuscriptorum Bibliothecae Bodleianae pars tertia codices Graecos et Latinos Canonicianos complectens, Quarto Catalogues III, 1854), with limited additional description. Quarto Catalogue, cols. 789–90 Quarto Catalogue, cols. 791–2 Quarto Catalogue, cols. 793–4 Summary Catalogue, vol. 4, p. 409

revisionDesc.change: Incorporate all information in printed description; limited additional description.

Mitch Fraas Provenance and acquisition information added using https://github.com/littlegustv/oxfordupdates/blob/master/test_case_for_oxford_prov.rb in collaboration with the Mapping Manuscript Migrations project
